name: @hazae41/berith
author: hazae41
description: WebAssembly port of Dalek's Ed25519 and X25519, Rust implementations of Ed25519 (EdDSA over Curve25519) signatures and X25519 (ECDH over Curve25519)

scripts.build:wasm: cd wasm && rimraf pkg && wasm-pack build --target web --release
scripts.build:dist: rimraf dist && deno run -A build.ts && rollup -c
scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run build:dist
